search.query: | tstats max(_time) as last_run where `ssphp_metrics_data_index{{environment}}' by index, sourcetype | eval last_run=strftime('last_run',"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") | table index, sourcetype, last_run | sort 0 - last_run

`ssphp_summary_index{{environment}}` earliest=-30d@d latest=now | stats max(SSPHP_RUN) as SSPHP_RUN by ssphp.use_case.id | eval last_run=strftime('SSPHP_RUN',"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") | table ssphp.use_case.id, last_run, SSPHP_RUN | sort 0 - last_run
